channel.title: Kaitnieks information?
channel.description: When did kaitnieks shut down? How long was kaitniks going strong? How long was it in between the closure of kaitnieks until mopar?

item.title: Kaitnieks information?
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

Yes; but RSC was in Beta stage when it happened…

Read full topic

item.title: Kaitnieks information?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Kaitnieks was around well before kaitnieks.com came to be, before the website and forums he had already written Autorune and SCAR. As to why it is considered one of the greatest communities in my opinion is simply because of how it was ran, no black market, no pictures in signatures, and open community, and friendly and helpful people. Other things made it great as well.

Thanks a lot, Mopar.

I figured he made Autorune after Kaitnieks.com.
The community’s fast growth rate makes more sense now that I know he was already famous before he had the forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Kaitnieks information?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:18, topic:133575”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=184824.msg1676911#msg1676911 date=1187211034]
I waited until it was final that the forums weren’t going to open back up, it was between one and two weeks.
[/quote]

Why did Kait announce mitb on his website?[/quote]

He didn’t…

3.65 kilos:

But still…how is Kaitnieks considered one of the greatest RS cheating communities ever if it was only around ~2 years? Did it have like…millions of members or something?

Kaitnieks was around well before kaitnieks.com came to be, before the website and forums he had already written Autorune and SCAR. As to why it is considered one of the greatest communities in my opinion is simply because of how it was ran, no black market, no pictures in signatures, and open community, and friendly and helpful people. Other things made it great as well.

Read full topic

Moparisthebest:

As far as I remember, it started around november of 04, but didn’t get very popular until around August 05, when the first released private server and later aryan brought thousands of people to the boards.

Whoa, Kaitnieks.com was only around for roughly two years?

@akisboy: Aryan is also a race of ancient people. That might be what you’re confusing it with.
